title: ExtraLife Stream 0900 25OCT14 -0900 26OCT14 (EST)
body:
EDIT: WE ARE LIVE!!!!!  {{summoner:10}} 

Ok boys and girls, I haven't streamed in a long time due to joining the U.S. Coast Guard and going to bootcamp and work.

However this is the kind of thing i can get behind. So i am going to do this 24hr stream from the time listed on the site: 

0900 Sat 25OCT14 - 0900 26OCT14 (EST)

I am a diamond support player (IGN: TollhouseCookie), and play adc on my plat smurfs, so mostly just gonna be having fun, and inviting all of you to join me.

Oh, and me and a couple of buddies are willing to match dollar for dollar all donations up to my goal of $200.

If we reach it i will be sending the t-shirt from ExtraLife that i get for reaching that goal, plus a gift certificate for TollhouseCookies to the top donator.

[Stream](http://www.twitch.tv/TollhouseC)

You can follow my old twitter, and ill post when im starting it up:

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/TollhouseC)


[Donation Link For ExtraLife](https://www.extra-life.org/index.cfm?fuseaction=donate.participant&participantID=134146)

replies.body:
Yay Extra Life! 

I'll be playing for Extra Life, too! We should play together!

Most Definitely, 

Add me IGN: Tollhouse Cookie and we will {{summoner:11}}  our enemies...

9 am dude?
gl with getting people to watch... I work afternoons lol

It's a 24 hour stream, so im just starting according to the time that Extra-Life has their National Game Day starting, which is 0800 Central.

So really ayone can come out, unless you have duty, in which case im sorry, i had mine already for the week :D
